alert.note: Alert for Central Greenville; Greater Pickens; Greenville Mountains; Pickens Mountains (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 1:51PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Greenville and northeastern Pickens Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 151 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles north of Pickens, or near Table Rock State Park, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pickens, Slater-Marietta, Table Rock State Park, Caesars Head State Park, Pumpkintown, Dacusville, Cleveland and Sunset. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Greenville; Greater Pickens; Greenville Mountains; Pickens Mountains
